text: I have eaten here on several occasions the food and service is always above my expectations. I am a local so when family comes to Las Vegas to visit I always enjoy bringing them here for a nice meal and relaxing atmosphere. I gave my mother a 75th birthday party here on  10-28-2017, upstairs in the private ballroom the food was delicious and more than enough for the 75 guests who attended.   Thank you Rhythm Kitchen for excellent food with great prices.
Could I please receive or text confirming my reservations for tomorrow @5:00 pm at (702)235-1177 Thank you
Service was very horrible I have been to Louisiana and the food does not taste nothing make this place
